thought: The Slack message sending action (action_3) currently has empty parameters, which causes the workflow execution failure. I need to properly set the parameters for sending a message to Slack channel #general with the provided text from input data.
plan: Set 'select' parameter to 'channel' to specify message recipient type.
Set 'channelId' with mode 'name' and value 'general' to target #general channel.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for a simple text message.
Set 'text' parameter to use expression to get 'text' field from input data.
Test Slack message sending after setting parameters.
criticism: Without setting these parameters, the Slack action cannot send messages, leading to workflow execution errors.

tool_input.comments: Send the file content to Slack channel #general with formatted message
